name: A. Hulk
statement:
Dr. Bruce Banner hates his enemies (like others don’t). As we all know,
he can barely talk when he turns into the incredible Hulk. That’s why he
asked you to help him to express his feelings.Hulk likes the Inception
so much, and like that his feelings are complicated. They have layers.
The first layer is hate, second one is love, third one is hate and so
on...For example if , then his feeling is "" or if it’s "", and if it’s
"" and so on.Please help Dr. Banner.
